item.text: Jesus looked up and saw the rich putting their gifts into the offering box.

He <st data-num="1161" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> a <st data-num="3998" class="">poor</st> <st data-num="5503" class="">widow</st> <st data-num="906">put in</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="3016">small copper coins</st>.<n id="1" />

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="230" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st> <st data-num="5503" class="">widow</st> has <st data-num="906" class="">put in</st> <st data-num="4183">more</st> than <st data-num="3956">all</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">them</st>.<n id="3" />
For they all offered their gifts out of their wealth. But she, out of her poverty, put in everything she had to live on.”
Now while some were speaking about the temple, how it was adorned with beautiful stones and offerings, Jesus said,

“As for <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> you are <st data-num="2334">gazing at</st>, the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1722 3739">when</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> one <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st> will be <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">another</st>.<n id="1" /> All will be <st data-num="2647">torn down</st>!”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, <st data-num="4219" class="">when</st> will <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">happen</st>? <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> will be the <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st> that<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> are <st data-num="3195">about to</st> <st data-num="1096">take place</st>?”

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="991">Watch out</st><n id="2" /> that you are <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4105" class="">misled</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> he,’<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st>, ‘The <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> is <st data-num="1448" class="">near.’</st> Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>!
And when you hear of wars and rebellions, do not be afraid. For these things must happen first, but the end will not come at once.”
Then he said to them, “Nation will rise up in arms against nation, and kingdom against kingdom.

There will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4578" class="">earthquakes</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3042" class="">famines</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3061" class="">plagues</st> in <st data-num="2596" class="">various</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">places</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5400">terrifying sights</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4253">before</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>,<n id="1" /> they will <st data-num="1911 5495">seize</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1377" class="">persecute</st> you, <st data-num="3860" class="">handing</st> you <st data-num="3860" class="">over</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prisons</st>. You<n id="4" /> will be <st data-num="520" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2232" class="">governors</st> <st data-num="1752">because of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.
This will <st data-num="576">be a time</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519">to serve</st> as <st data-num="3142" class="">witnesses</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> be <st data-num="5087 2588">resolved</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="4304">rehearse<n id="2" /> ahead of time</st> how to <st data-num="626" class="">make</st> your <st data-num="626" class="">defense</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="4750" class="">words</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532">along with</st> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">none</st> of <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="480" class="">adversaries</st> will be <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="436" class="">withstand</st> <st data-num="2228">or</st> <st data-num="471" class="">contradict</st>.

You will be <st data-num="3860" class="">betrayed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>, <st data-num="4773" class="">relatives</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5384" class="">friends</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will have some <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2289">put to death</st>.

You will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3404" class="">hated</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> will <st data-num="622" class="">perish</st>.<n id="2" />
By your endurance you will gain your lives.
“But when you see Jerusalem surrounded by armies, then know that its desolation has come near.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> those who are <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> must <st data-num="5343" class="">flee</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3735" class="">mountains</st>. <st data-num="3588">Those</st><n id="2" /> who are <st data-num="1722 3319">inside</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">city</st> must <st data-num="1633" class="">depart</st>. Those<n id="3" /> who are out <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5561" class="">country</st> must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>,

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of <st data-num="1557" class="">vengeance</st>,<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4130" class="">fulfill</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956">all</st> that is <st data-num="1125">written</st>.

<st data-num="3759" class="">Woe</st> to <st data-num="3588">those</st> who <st data-num="2192">are</st> <st data-num="1722 1064">pregnant</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="3588">those</st> who are <st data-num="2337" class="">nursing</st> their <st data-num="2337" class="">babies</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>! <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="318" class="">distress</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st> against <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>.
They will fall by the edge of the sword and be led away as captives among all nations. Jerusalem will be trampled down by the Gentiles until the times of the Gentiles are fulfilled.
“And there will be signs in the sun and moon and stars, and on the earth nations will be in distress, anxious over the roaring of the sea and the surging waves.
People will be fainting from fear and from the expectation of what is coming on the world, for the powers of the heavens will be shaken.
Then they will see the Son of Man arriving in a cloud with power and great glory.
But when these things begin to happen, stand up and raise your heads because your redemption is drawing near.”
Then he told them a parable: “Look at the fig tree and all the other trees.

<st data-num="3752" class="">When</st> they <st data-num="4261">sprout leaves</st>, you <st data-num="991" class="">see</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> and <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2330" class="">summer</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2235" class="">now</st> <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st>.

<st data-num="3779" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">happening</st>, <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3928">pass away</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3956">these things</st> <st data-num="1096">take place</st>.
Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will never pass away.
“But be on your guard so that your hearts are not weighed down with dissipation and drunkenness and the worries of this life, and that day close down upon you suddenly like a trap.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st><n id="1" /> it will <st data-num="1904" class="">overtake</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="2521" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4383" class="">face</st> of the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>.<n id="3" />
But stay alert at all times, praying that you may have strength to escape all these things that must happen, and to stand before the Son of Man.”
So every day Jesus was teaching in the temple courts, but at night he went and stayed on the Mount of Olives.
And all the people came to him early in the morning to listen to him in the temple courts.
